name: Toward Justice by Joseph O'Connell and Creative Machines

metadata.name: Create Justice 1/5
metadata.description: Create Justice depicts an interactive gateway that gives physical form to a historic arc bending toward justice. Force sensors drive animated lighting in the arches, and as people push, the gap narrows. The handprints suggest every one of us put our hands on the arc to bend it toward justice.
metadata.collection: Toward Justice by Joseph O'Connell and Creative Machines

attributes.Collection: Toward Justice by Joseph O'Connell and Creative Machines
